description: Today three of your favorites are back and reporting for duty! Me (behind the camera of course), along with Riley and Shea who are also returning to the fold after a long absence. Riley is gorgeous as always, with that baby face that is so irresistible, right on down his near perfect body to his muscular, thick and delicious legs. Shea was my prize after hunting down gorgeous guys at the sporting goods section of my local Walmart, and I knew I'd have this trophy mounted soon by7 someone or vice-versa!Today is the first time I've seen the edited version so I'm going to watch it right along with you and rather than bore you (and keep my hands busy with the keyboard) with a play-by-play, I'm not even gonna say a word.  This one speaks for itself and I'm sure after we all watch it, we will be too damned out of breath to do anything except for to raise both thumbs in approval!
title: Riley & Shea, Scene #01
